review: Tried the Amazon product and could not get it to work.  No help from Amazon.  Returned it and purchased the Roku.  Simple to install. Worked immediately.  Easy to use. I wouldn't be without it.  Now on every one of my TVs.
author: Alan H. Silverman

review: Works great for YouTube and NetFlix, which is exactly what I wanted.  Remote needed to be reset often at first, but seems OK now.
author: Mark W. steinbruch

review: Roku is the best of the best in streaming sticks.  We tried Chomecast and Fire, but Roku is the most reliable product and has great features.  The setup is very user friendly which is also important.  Love my Roku.
author: D Woods

review: I ended up buying 3 of these Roku sticks and gave them away to family members for Christmas.  They are easy to use and it has been hailed as the best Christmas gift ever to my grandfather who is almost impossible to please.  He's been streaming Netflix like there is no tomorrow.  Bravo, Roku!
author: Heather

review: Had some trouble with losing signal with this device... I also purchased the Amazon fire stick and like it much better!
author: kelly upton

review: We LOVE LOVE LOVE this!!  We just brought it on vacation with us so that we could have the kids use it at the hotel.  Makes life so much easier, they use it for amazon instant video as well as netflix, such a great gift to give as well, we've done it several times now!
author: Jill Brown

review: Nice alternative to DirecTV.  Easy set-up.
author: MasterCaster
